casebody.data:
STEAMTUG CENTRAL STATES, Inc., as Owner of the Tug THE CHEROKEE, Libellant-Appellant, v. Diesel Tug THE EMPIRE, STANDARD TOWING CORPORATION, Claimant-Appellee, and Tug THIS CLAREMONT, Tug Claremont Corporation, Claimant-Impleaded-Appellee. No. 358. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 10, 1940. Foley & Martin, of New York City (James A. Martin and Christopher E. Heckman, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Mahar & Mason, of New York City (Frank C. Mason, of New York City, of counsel), for claimant-appellee.

Before SWAN, CHASE, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
